description: This file is an ESLint configuration module written in JavaScript, exporting an array of configuration objects for linting TypeScript and JavaScript files in a project.

methods.name: import (typescript from '@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin')
methods.description: Imports the TypeScript ESLint plugin for linting TypeScript code.

methods.name: import (tsParser from '@typescript-eslint/parser')
methods.description: Imports the TypeScript ESLint parser for parsing TypeScript files.
